item.title: Hi I am Jade!
item.description:
I’m a Senior Software Engineer at Charter, where I work on high-scale backend systems managing over 1 billion daily API transactions. My role spans multiple key areas: leading the core gateway team that handles all API interactions with Charter, developing AI standards and SOPs that will be implemented across the organization, and building Dispatch â€” an intelligent ticket triage system that automates Jira workflow management.

What I Do

  • Lead and mentor junior developers on daily tasks, system architecture, and operational best practices
  • Facilitate bi-weekly release processes with automated MOP creation, deployment status tracking, and test automation
  • Implement AI functionality within engineering processes, including SOP creation and agent-driven workflows
  • Build and integrate new features with external partners (Disney, Peacock, Hulu) and internal Spectrum systems

Skills

Languages: Java (professional), Python (personal projects), Go (learning), Nix Frameworks: Spring, FastAPI
Databases: Cassandra, PostgreSQL, SQLite
Tools: Git, K8s, AWS
